text.title: Cope in the World of Ego

head.s: Cope in the World of Ego

p.s: Everyone has an ego , it is how they want to project themselves to others , how people expect others to treat them , ego is our expectation of our own self .
It is n't even a bit simple as it sounds and it tends to get extremely annoying when people impose their ego on us .

item.s: Be humble .
Thy should be humble first in order to cope up with the ego of others .
You should be aware of your ego and should restrict its imposition on others - unnecessarily .

figure.rend: Cope in the World of Ego Step 1.jpg

item.s: Acknowledge .
People impose their ego or are " egoistic " due to want of acknowledgement and/or acceptance from others .
They may not seem like your average attention seekers but they do crave for it - unconsciously .

figure.rend: Cope in the World of Ego Step 2.jpg

item.s: Remember .
Remember the points of imposition of ego and try not to impose yours in those ' dangerous ' waters .

figure.rend: Cope in the World of Ego Step 3.jpg

item.s: Understand .
Understand that ego is the image that a person associates with himself and it is natural to be present .
It by understanding that everyone is different and unique in their own way that we can cope in the world of ego .

figure.rend: Cope in the World of Ego Step 4.jpg

item.s: Lose to win .
When its the war of egos , the first one to lose is actually the winner .
If a heated argument is one , lose it .
As the argument ends - you win .
Though know when you can afford to lose and when it is required to win .

figure.rend: Cope in the World of Ego Step 5.jpg

item.s: Be ahead of the curve .
Always be ahead of the matters in order to escape the trap of ego conflict .
Once the opposition knows you are no longer in their league , you will never be bothered .

figure.rend: Cope in the World of Ego Step 6.jpg

item.s: Learn .
Learning how others exert their ego on us , how we exert/impose our ego on others , what is the cause for it , why we do it are some questions worth contemplating over .
When we tend to find answers to these questions , coping with ego will seem a lot more easier .

figure.rend: Cope in the World of Ego Step 7.jpg

item.s: Trade fairly .
All egoistic people tend to expect something in return from us , either in form of appreciation or favour or applause or flatter or respect or acknowledgement .
Knowing this demand and catering to it in our bounds & comfort zone is the right way to tackle and cope with the world of ego .

figure.rend: Cope in the World of Ego Step 8.jpg

item.s: Become a pacifist .
Being a pacifist , not being too aggressive or offensive in your opinions or views or speech can be quite helpful in coping with ego .
People tend to use their ego as a defense mechanism to protect themselves or their beliefs from what they find to be threatening or offensive .

figure.rend: Cope in the World of Ego Step 9.jpg

item.s: Smile gently and behave in a friendly way .
Being humble never akin to low self image or morale or allowing others to exploit oneself .
It just means not to assert thy ego on others - unnecessarily .
Always look out for your imposition of the ego on others .
